title: Market Sizing Research
description: An agent must research and estimate the Total Addressable Market (TAM) for a new product, citing its sources.

tasks.description: Search for market research reports, industry analyses, and government statistics related to the product's category.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds at least three credible sources for market size data.

tasks.description: Synthesize the data from the different sources to arrive at a defensible TAM estimate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a final TAM estimate (e.g., '$5 billion') and explains the methodology used to reach it.

tasks.description: Compile a summary slide with the TAM estimate and a list of the sources used.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear summary with proper citations.
